HomePage.title: Screetner: Urban Asset Management Made Simple
HomePage.description: A cutting-edge street scanning system to help cities manage their infrastructure effortlessly.

urbanAssetTracking.title: Urban Asset Tracking
urbanAssetTracking.description: Monitor and manage urban infrastructure such as roads, signs, and utilities using our real-time tracking system.

streetScanning.title: Street Scanning
streetScanning.description: Our system uses advanced scanning technology to collect detailed street-level imagery for analysis.

reportingAnalytics.title: Reporting & Analytics
reportingAnalytics.description: Generate comprehensive reports and insights to help you plan and prioritize infrastructure maintenance.
